mainBoard.flavorText: "We share a common enemy. Does that not make us friends?"
mainBoard.name: Calculating Lich
mainBoard.originalText:
Menace
Whenever a creature attacks one of your opponents, that player loses 1 life.
mainBoard.text:
Menace
Whenever a creature attacks one of your opponents, that player loses 1 life.

mainBoard.name: Torgaar, Famine Incarnate
mainBoard.originalText:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This spell costs {2} less to cast for each creature sacrificed this way.
When Torgaar, Famine Incarnate enters the battlefield, up to one target player's life total becomes half their starting life total, rounded down.

rulings.text: For your life total to become half your starting life total (normally 10, half of 20), you gain or lose the appropriate amount of life. For example, if your life total is 4 when Torgaar’s ability resolves targeting you, it will cause you to gain 6 life; alternatively, if your life total is 25 when it resolves, it will cause you to lose 15 life. Other cards that interact with life gain or life loss will interact with this effect accordingly.

In a Two-Headed Giant game, Torgaar’s ability causes the team’s life total to become half the team’s starting life total (normally 15, half of 30), but only the target player actually gains or loses life.
Torgaar’s first ability can’t reduce its cost below {B}{B}. You can sacrifice any number of creatures, even if they won’t reduce Torgaar’s cost any further.

mainBoard.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This spell costs {2} less to cast for each creature sacrificed this way.
When Torgaar, Famine Incarnate enters, up to one target player's life total becomes half their starting life total, rounded down.

mainBoard.flavorText: It beckons silently, waiting in the darkness.

foreignData.flavorText: Wartend in der Dunkelheit winkt sie dir still zu.
foreignData.name: Grauenhafte Präsenz
foreignData.text:
Immer wenn ein Sumpf unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel kommt, bestimme eines —
• Du ziehst eine Karte und verlierst 1 Lebenspunkt.
• Die Grauenhafte Präsenz fügt einem Ziel deiner Wahl 2 Schadenspunkte zu und du erhältst 2 Lebenspunkte dazu.

foreignData.flavorText: Hace señas en silencio, esperando en la oscuridad.
foreignData.name: Presencia terrorífica
foreignData.text:
Siempre que un Pantano entre al campo de batalla bajo tu control, elige uno:
• Robas una carta y pierdes 1 vida.
• La Presencia terrorífica hace 2 puntos de daño a cualquier objetivo y tú ganas 2 vidas.

foreignData.flavorText: Elle vous appelle en silence, patiemment dans les ténèbres.
foreignData.name: Présence effroyable
foreignData.text:
À chaque fois qu'un marais arrive sur le champ de bataille sous votre contrôle, choisissez l'un —
• Vous piochez une carte et vous perdez 1 point de vie.
• La Présence effroyable inflige 2 blessures à n'importe quelle cible et vous gagnez 2 points de vie.

foreignData.flavorText: Lancia richiami silenziosi, restando in attesa nell'oscurità.
foreignData.name: Presenza Terrificante
foreignData.text:
Ogniqualvolta una Palude entra nel campo di battaglia sotto il tuo controllo, scegli uno —
• Pesca una carta e perdi 1 punto vita.
• La Presenza Terrificante infligge 2 danni a un qualsiasi bersaglio e tu guadagni 2 punti vita.

foreignData.flavorText: 無言で合図し、闇の中で待つ。
foreignData.name: 戦慄の存在
foreignData.text:
沼が１つあなたのコントロール下で戦場に出るたび、以下から１つを選ぶ。
• あなたはカードを１枚引き、あなたは１点のライフを失う。
• クリーチャー１体かプレインズウォーカー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。戦慄の存在はそれに２点のダメージを与え、あなたは２点のライフを得る。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ナイトメア

foreignData.flavorText: 그것은 어둠 속에서 기다리며 조용히 손짓한다.
foreignData.name: 공포스러운 존재감
foreignData.text:
늪이 당신의 조종하에 전장에 들어올 때마다, 하나를 선택한다 —
• 당신은 카드 한 장을 뽑고 생명 1점을 잃는다.
• 원하는 목표를 정한다. 공포스러운 존재감은 그 목표에게 피해 2점을 입히고 당신은 생명 2점을 얻는다.

foreignData.flavorText: Ela chama silenciosamente, aguardando na escuridão.
foreignData.name: Presença Medonha
foreignData.text:
Toda vez que um Pântano entrar no campo de batalha sob o seu controle, escolha um —
• Você compra um card e perde 1 ponto de vida.
• Presença Medonha causa 2 pontos de dano a qualquer alvo e você ganha 2 pontos de vida.

foreignData.flavorText: Она манит тебя, ожидая в темноте, не говоря ни слова.
foreignData.name: Жуткая Сущность
foreignData.text:
Каждый раз, когда Болото выходит на поле битвы под вашим контролем, выберите одно —
• Вы берете карту и теряете 1 жизнь.
• Жуткая Сущность наносит 2 повреждения любой цели, а вы получаете 2 жизни.

foreignData.flavorText: 它在黑暗之中静静等待，悄然回应。
foreignData.name: 颤栗鬼影
foreignData.text:
每当一个沼泽在你的操控下进战场时，选择一项～
•你抓一张牌且你失去1点生命。
•颤栗鬼影对任意一个目标造成2点伤害，且你获得2点生命。

foreignData.flavorText: 它在黑暗之中靜靜等待，悄然回應。
foreignData.name: 顫慄鬼影
foreignData.text:
每當一個沼澤在你的操控下進戰場時，選擇一項～
•你抽一張牌且你失去1點生命。
•顫慄鬼影對任意一個目標造成2點傷害，且你獲得2點生命。

mainBoard.name: Dread Presence
mainBoard.originalText:
Whenever a Swamp enters the battlefield under your control, choose one —
• You draw a card and you lose 1 life.
• Dread Presence deals 2 damage to any target and you gain 2 life.

rulings.text: A Swamp is a land with the subtype Swamp, not any land with a mana ability that produces black mana.

If you choose the second mode and the chosen target is an illegal target by the time Dread Presence’s triggered ability tries to resolve, the ability doesn’t resolve. You won’t gain 2 life, and the ability won’t change to the first mode.

mainBoard.text:
Whenever a Swamp you control enters, choose one —
• You draw a card and you lose 1 life.
• Dread Presence deals 2 damage to any target and you gain 2 life.

mainBoard.flavorText: "You can sign, or you can spend your life imagining what might have been yours."

foreignData.flavorText: „Du kannst unterschreiben oder dir dein Leben lang vorstellen, was dir alles hätte gehören können."

foreignData.text:

Immer wenn du Lebenspunkte verlierst, ziehe entsprechend viele Karten. (Schaden verursacht den Verlust von Lebenspunkten.)

foreignData.flavorText: 「署名するも良し。手に入ったはずのものを思い浮かべながら一生を送るも良し。お前次第だ。」

foreignData.flavorText: "서명을 하던가, 아니면 네가 가질 수 있었던 것이 무엇일까 궁금해하며 여생을 보내던가."

mainBoard.name: Vilis, Broker of Blood
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
{B}, Pay 2 life: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
Whenever you lose life, draw that many cards. (Damage causes loss of life.)

rulings.text: A player loses life if they pay life.

If you pay life to cast a spell or activate an ability, you don’t draw cards until after you’ve finished casting that spell or activating that ability. You draw those cards before that spell or ability resolves, but after targets are chosen for it.

mainBoard.text:
Flying
{B}, Pay 2 life: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
Whenever you lose life, draw that many cards. (Damage causes loss of life.)

foreignData.name: Schlingender Aasgeier
foreignData.text:
Fliegend
Wenn der Schlingende Aasgeier ins Spiel kommt, lege die obersten vier Karten deiner Bibliothek auf deinen Friedhof. Du erhältst für jede Kreaturenkarte, die auf diese Weise auf deinen Friedhof gelegt wurde, 1 Lebenspunkt dazu.

foreignData.name: Buitre atiborrándose
foreignData.text:
Vuela.
Cuando el Buitre atiborrándose entre al campo de batalla, pon las cuatro primeras cartas de tu biblioteca en tu cementerio. Ganas 1 vida por cada carta de criatura que vaya al cementerio de esta manera.

foreignData.name: Vautour goulu
foreignData.text:
Vol
Quand le Vautour goulu arrive sur le champ de bataille, mettez les quatre cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque dans votre cimetière. Vous gagnez 1 point de vie pour chaque carte de créature mise dans votre cimetière de cette manière.

foreignData.name: Avvoltoio Divoratore
foreignData.text:
Volare
Quando l'Avvoltoio Divoratore entra nel campo di battaglia, metti nel tuo cimitero le prime quattro carte del tuo grimorio. Guadagni 1 punto vita per ogni carta creatura messa nel tuo cimitero in questo modo.

foreignData.name: 貪る禿鷹
foreignData.text:
飛行
貪る禿鷹が戦場に出たとき、あなたのライブラリーの一番上からカードを４枚あなたの墓地に置く。あなたは、これによりあなたの墓地に置かれたクリーチャー・カード１枚につき１点のライフを得る。

foreignData.name: 게걸스러운 대머리독수리
foreignData.text:
비행
게걸스러운 대머리독수리가 전장에 들어올 때, 당신의 서고 맨 위 카드 네 장을 당신의 무덤에 넣는다. 당신은 이런 식으로 당신의 무덤에 놓인 생물 카드 한 장당 생명 1점을 얻는다.

foreignData.name: Abutre Esfomeado
foreignData.text:
Voar
Quando Abutre Esfomeado entrar no campo de batalha, coloque os quatro cards do topo de seu grimório em seu cemitério. Você ganha 1 ponto de vida para cada card de criatura colocado em seu cemitério dessa forma.

foreignData.name: Обожравшийся Гриф
foreignData.text:
Полет
Когда Обожравшийся Гриф выходит на поле битвы, положите четыре верхние карты вашей библиотеки на ваше кладбище. Вы получаете 1 жизнь за каждую карту существа, положенную на ваше кладбище таким образом.

foreignData.name: 食尸兀鹰
foreignData.text:
飞行
当食尸兀鹰进战场时，将你牌库顶的四张牌置入你的坟墓场。每以此法将一张生物牌置入你的坟墓场，你便获得1点生命。

foreignData.name: 食屍兀鷹
foreignData.text:
飛行
當食屍兀鷹進戰場時，將你牌庫頂的四張牌置入你的墳墓場。每以此法將一張生物牌置入你的墳墓場，你便獲得1點生命。

mainBoard.name: Gorging Vulture
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
When Gorging Vulture enters the battlefield, put the top four cards of your library into your graveyard. You gain 1 life for each creature card put into your graveyard this way.
mainBoard.text:
Flying
When Gorging Vulture enters, mill four cards. You gain 1 life for each creature card milled this way. (To mill four cards, put the top four cards of your library into your graveyard.)

mainBoard.flavorText: In Amonkhet's ever-shifting sands, nothing stays buried for long.

foreignData.flavorText: Was der Wind nicht von allein freilegt, wird von anderer Hand wieder ausgegraben.
foreignData.name: Totengräber
foreignData.text: Wenn der Totengräber ins Spiel kommt, kannst du eine Kreaturenkarte deiner Wahl aus deinem Friedhof auf deine Hand zurückbringen.

foreignData.flavorText: En las arenas siempre cambiantes de Amonkhet, nada permanece enterrado mucho tiempo.
foreignData.name: Sepulturero
foreignData.text: Cuando el Sepulturero entre al campo de batalla, puedes regresar la carta de criatura objetivo de tu cementerio a tu mano.

foreignData.flavorText: Rien ne reste enterré bien longtemps dans les sables en perpétuel mouvement d'Amonkhet.
foreignData.name: Fossoyeur
foreignData.text: Quand le Fossoyeur arrive sur le champ de bataille, vous pouvez renvoyer une carte de créature ciblée depuis votre cimetière dans votre main.

foreignData.flavorText: Niente resta sepolto a lungo sotto le sabbie in perenne movimento di Amonkhet.
foreignData.name: Scavatombe
foreignData.text: Quando lo Scavatombe entra nel campo di battaglia, puoi riprendere in mano una carta creatura bersaglio dal tuo cimitero.

foreignData.flavorText: アモンケットの砂は絶えず流動する。埋もれたままの物はない。

foreignData.flavorText: Nas areias sempre em movimento de Amonkhet, nada permanece enterrado por muito tempo.

mainBoard.name: Undead Servant
mainBoard.originalText: When Undead Servant enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token for each card named Undead Servant in your graveyard.

rulings.text: Count the number of Undead Servants in your graveyard as the ability resolves to determine how many tokens to put onto the battlefield. If Undead Servant dies in response to its own triggered ability and is in your graveyard as that ability resolves, it will count toward the number of Zombies you get.

mainBoard.text: When Undead Servant enters, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token for each card named Undead Servant in your graveyard.

mainBoard.name: Accursed Horde
mainBoard.originalText: {1}{B}: Target attacking Zombie gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it. If its toughness is 0 or less, it's still put into its owner's graveyard.)

rulings.text: Accursed Horde's ability can target itself while it's attacking.
The target Zombie gains indestructible for the rest of the turn, even after it stops being an attacking creature.

rulings.text: If Gavony Unhallowed and another creature you control die simultaneously (perhaps because they were both attacking or blocking), Gavony Unhallowed won’t be on the battlefield as its triggered ability resolves. It can’t be saved by the +1/+1 counter that would have been put on it.

mainBoard.name: Blood for Bones
mainBoard.originalText:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Return a creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield, then return another creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

rulings.text: Any abilities that trigger as the creature card is returned to the battlefield won’t resolve until after Blood for Bones is finished resolving.

Blood for Bones doesn’t target the creature cards to return from your graveyard. This means that, while the spell is resolving, no player may take any actions between the time you choose the cards and return them.
Once you begin to cast Blood for Bones, no player may take actions until you’re done. Notably, opponents can’t try to remove the creature you wish to sacrifice.
The creature sacrificed to cast Blood for Bones may be one of the cards chosen to be returned.
You must sacrifice exactly one creature to cast this spell; you can’t cast it without sacrificing a creature, and you can’t sacrifice additional creatures.

mainBoard.name: Rise from the Grave
mainBoard.originalText: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.

rulings.text: A later effect that changes the affected creature’s colors will overwrite that part of Rise from the Grave’s effect; the creature will be only the new color. The same is true about an effect that changes the affected creature’s types or subtypes.
If the creature is normally colorless, it will simply become black. It can’t be both black and colorless.
Rise from the Grave doesn’t overwrite any previous colors or types. Rather, it adds another color and another subtype.
